title: Electrical Installations in Outbuildings
fullText:
A switch for safety services that is installed on the switchboard in an outbuilding shall be regarded as a main switch, in accordance with Clause 7.2.4. A safety service main switch installed in an outbuilding shall be clearly identified in accordance with Clause 7.2.4.4.

Any switch that: (a) is located remote from an outbuilding in which safety services are provided; and (b) operates in the supply circuit to a safety service main switch installed in the outbuilding, shall be clearly identified in accordance with Clause 7.2.4.4(b) and (c).
